jumia.name: Caroline
jumia.review: Seller didn't ship so after the handling time had past I contacted them. They told me they don't have the item and can't figure out how to cancel the sale.

jumia.name: Lambertini
jumia.reviewtittle: Great app for purchasing all items.
jumia.review: Great app for purchasing all items... Makes online selling sweet and affordable safe and fast way to buy products...

jumia.name: Issah Bukari
jumia.review: Very reliable, you can be sure of the delivery where ever you are in the country.

jiji.name: Dan m
jiji.review: WARNING DO NOT BUY THIS!!! This is false advertising!!! The title say Zojirushi stainless steel mug, but it is a CHINESE KNOCK OFF!!!

jiji.name: Jay
jiji.review: Nice marketplace. Receive products before paying that's all you will be fine. And ensure you meet In an open place.

jiji.name: Edward B
jiji.review: It was personal and friendly and genuine. Great people to work with and interact with.

alibaba.name: RKG
alibaba.review: I ordered jute placemats and was nervous about the delivery time and what the quality would be.

alibaba.name: J De Bruin
alibaba.review: Delivered as promised. Printer very good professional quality, affordable price and easy to install.

alibaba.name: Nisa
alibaba.review: Their customer service really set them apart for me. Winnie Zhang was exceptional in answering questions and providing guidance throughout the entire process.

alibaba.name: Andre Nakaso
alibaba.review: Very professional and positive experience working with this supplier. Nice quality product, fast communications and replies to our questions.

amazon.name: TG
amazon.review: From start to delivery, a smooth process. All questions answered and great service. No issues with language barriers. Products arrived very well packaged.

amazon.name: Kinsley
amazon.review: Just as ordered! Shipped quickly! Representative was professional and efficient!

amazon.name: Zuleika
amazon.review: Great quality and design. I was surprised with it and it came before the delivery date.

amazon.name: Jake
amazon.reviewtittle: Great Price, Customer Service, And Parts.
amazon.review: The customer service from Amanda was excellent and the parts produced from the mold were perfect - all for a price that was among the lowest quotes we received.

killmall.name: Mr Anmol
killmall.review: The supplier was great to deal with. I was made so comfortable during the whole process altogether. Highly recommend.

killmall.name: Ryan Smith
killmall.review: They delivered something I've been wanting for a very long time at a very fair price and with great customer service.

killmall.name: James
killmall.review: Fast shipment and turn around. High quality leather and the design was extremely accurate.

ebay.name: Ricardo Joao
ebay.review: Ebay approved a purchase and then suspended my account with no further information. Profoundly unprofessional.

ebay.review: It was personal and friendly and genuine. Great people to work with and interact with.

ebay.reviewtittle: I Know i can Trust eBay for Online Shopping.

ebay.review: It was personal and friendly and genuine. Great people to work with and interact with.

zappos.name: Kerri
zappos.review: Maria in Customer service department was great! I reached out via chat option, and she was able to help me out and fix my issue within 5 minutes. Great service, you normally donâ€™t come across such stellar service with online retailers.

zappos.name: Denise Fuentes
zappos.reviewtittle: Great shoes and great items we shop
zappos.review: Great shoes and great items we shop many time and very happy with it ;) will be back for sure

zappos.name: James
zappos.review: I have had nothing but great experiences with Zappo. Prompt shipping; free returns; great selection! Highly recommend!
